text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Myelodysplastic Syndromes

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    128623006 Myelodysplastic syndrome (morphologic abnormality)
    128836009 Refractory cytopenia with multilineage dysplasia (morphologic abnormality)
    128837000 Myelodysplastic syndrome with 5q- syndrome (morphologic abnormality)
    128838005 Therapy-related myelodysplastic syndrome (morphologic abnormality)
    128845005 Refractory anemia (morphologic abnormality)
    128846006 Refractory anemia with sideroblasts (morphologic abnormality)
    128847002 Refractory anemia with excess blasts (morphologic abnormality)
    128848007 Refractory anemia with excess blasts in transformation (morphologic abnormality)
    373381004 Myelodysplastic syndrome, no International Classification of Diseases for Oncology subtype (morphologic abnormality)
    397338009 Refractory anemia with excess blasts I (morphologic abnormality)
    397339001 Refractory anemia with excess blasts II (morphologic abnormality)
    450945008 Refractory cytopenia with unilineage dysplasia (morphologic abnormality)
    450946009 Refractory neutropenia (morphologic abnormality)
    450947000 Refractory thrombocytopenia (morphologic abnormality)
    703817002 Refractory anemia with ring sideroblasts associated with marked thrombocytosis (morphologic abnormality)
    789435006 Myelodysplastic syndrome with ring sideroblasts and multilineage dysplasia (morphologic abnormality)

name: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Myelodysplastic Syndromes
